Package com.bwoestman.weatheralarm

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AppInfo
    this class stores constants used by the application
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Alarm
    this class is a pojo that is used to hold all the alarm data
    AlarmController
    this class acts as the controller for all alarm activities including: setting intents, validating alarm times and calculating adjustments and precipitation
    AlarmEditFragment
    this class is a fragment where the alarms are edited
    AlarmListFragment
    this class is a fragment where the alarms are displayed in a list using the recycler view
    AlarmService
    this class is called when the app wakes up after being called by the alarm manager - its purpose, on start, is to check the alarm that set the intent that called it and then determine if the alarm needs to be set based on the precipitation.
    AlarmTest
    Created by Brian Woestman on 3/6/16.
    AlarmWeather
    Created by Brian Woestman on 3/5/16.
    ApplicationTest
    Testing Fundamentals
    BuildConfig  
    DBHandler
    this class is used to make all the calls to the sqlite database
    DBHandlerTest
    Created by Brian Woestman on 3/6/16.
    ExampleUnitTest
    To work on unit tests, switch the Test Artifact in the Build Variants view.
    MainActivity  
    R  
    R.anim  
    R.attr  
    R.bool  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.integer  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.mipmap  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    R.styleable  
    SingletonAlarm
    this class is used to store data while the application is running
